parameters.name: InstanceId
parameters.description:
The ID of the WAF instance.

>  Obtain the ID of the WAF instance by calling the [DescribeInstance](~~433756~~) operation.

parameters.name: NextToken
parameters.description: The pagination token that is used in the next request to retrieve a new page of results.

parameters.name: RegionId
parameters.description:
The region of the WAF instance. Valid values:

*   **cn-hangzhou**: Chinese mainland.
*   **ap-southeast-1**: Outside the Chinese mainland.

parameters.name: ResourceManagerResourceGroupId
parameters.description: The ID of the Alibaba Cloud resource group.

parameters.name: ResourceType
parameters.description: The type of the resource. Set the value to ALIYUN::WAF::DEFENSERESOURCE.
